snippet: Why was a 16-year-old American citizen killed by a drone strike in Yemen?
abstract: Op-Ed article by Nasser al-Awlaki questions how American authorities can justify death of his grandson Abdulrahman, who was killed in American drone strike in Yemen in 2011, two weeks after his father, Anwar, was killed in similar strike; contends government should at least have to explain why it killed a 16-year-old American boy.
lead_paragraph: Why was a 16-year-old American citizen killed by a drone strike in Yemen?

headline.main: The Drone That Killed My Grandson
headline.print_headline: The Drone That Killed My Grandson
